import Foundation

func solution(_ str1:String, _ str2:String) -> String {
    
    var result = [Character]()
    var a = Array(str1)
    var b = Array(str2)
    
    for i in 0..<str1.count {
        result.append(a[i])
        result.append(b[i])
        
    }
    
    return String(result)
}


// "ababababab"
